text: The Remix is the debut remix album by American singer Ariana Grande. It features fifteen remixes of her singles from her first two studio albums: Yours Truly (2013) and My Everything (2014). It was released exclusively in Japan on May 25, 2015 and peaked at number 32 on the Oricon Albums Chart. ==Track listing== ==Charts== Chart (2015) Peak position ==Release history== Region Date Format Label Ref.
